description.en: A compact everyday crossbody bag with a clean look and practical storage. Features a zip-top main compartment, front pocket, and adjustable strap—great for commuting, travel, and daily essentials like phone, wallet, and small notebook. OEM/ODM customization available for fabrics (including recycled options), size, pockets, logo patch, lining, zippers (YKK optional) & hardware, and packaging.
description.zh: 轻便日常斜挎包，外观简洁，收纳实用。主仓拉链开合，前袋便于快取，肩带可调，适合通勤、旅行与日常随身（手机、钱包、小本子等）。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：面料（可选再生环保材料）、尺寸、口袋结构、Logo 工艺、内里、拉链（可选 YKK）与五金、包装等。

en: Outer: Nylon / Polyester (customizable; recycled options available)
Zipper: Standard zipper or YKK optional
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery (customizable)
zh: 面料：尼龙/涤纶（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
拉链：常规拉链或可选 YKK
肩带：可调节织带肩带（可定制）
五金：调节扣/挂钩/D 环等（可定制）

en.Customization: Fabric, color, size, pocket layout, logo, lining, zipper & hardware, packaging

zh.参考尺寸: 宽 20–26cm × 高 14–18cm × 深 6–10cm（可定制）
zh.适用场景: 日常随身、通勤、旅行收纳
zh.可定制: 面料配色、尺寸、口袋结构、Logo、内里、拉链五金、包装
